fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 Take a friend on an adventure when you book a TrekAmerica (0870 444 8735; trekamerica.co.uk) tour between March and June. Choose from USA, Canada or Mexico, and you can book a second place for just £75. Under £250 Sample Leeds, the coolest city in the north, including free designer gift vouchers for him and her. Valid until 28 February at 42 The Calls (0113 244 0099; 42thecalls.co.uk). A night costs £225 for two with breakfast. One week at the Flamingo Playa Apartments on the Costa Blanca costs £225pp with Portland Holidays Direct (08705 002200; portland-direct.co.uk). Departing on 22 February, the price includes seven nights' self-catering accommodation, flights from Luton and transfers. Under £400 The AirMiles Travel Company (0870 607 3741; airmiles.co.uk) has seven nights' half-board at the three-star Theofano in Paphos, Cyprus, departing 23 February from Manchester from £329pp. Under £700 Abercrombie and Kent (0845 070 0612; abercrombiekent.co.uk) offers four nights at the Mövenpick Hotel and Resort in Beirut from £665pp including flights until 16 June. Under £900 Privacy and relaxation in Cape Town is available at Ezard House on the slopes of Table Mountain. Book by 18 March and four nights with breakfast will cost £879pp including flights from Heathrow with Voyana (020 8515 4604; voyana.com/africa)
